title: Typo in Create a self-signed SSL certificate section
author: nibrahv
body:
Typo in Create a self-signed SSL certificate section:

Currently:
python api-key-secret-manager-upload.py.py -s openAiApiKey

Should be:
python api-key-secret-manager-upload.py -s openAiApiKey

title: Missing CDK Bootstrap Guidance
author: nibrahv
body:
Unable to run the initial "npx cdk deploy BaseInfraStack" step due to environment not having been bootstrapped.  

![image](https://github.com/aws-samples/rag-with-amazon-bedrock-and-pgvector/assets/10162226/ee61f677-f97c-4634-9b1a-ec9fb2b31723)

Performing "npx cdk bootstrap" resolved the issue and allowed me to proceed.
